body:
In all these functions, it is probably prudent to handle the case where `Server.close()` has already been called (and thus `handle` is 0). I think currently this will crash.

You may want to do something like: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/0f1894de6cfddb3df8a3d6865d97b947af56f995/tensorflow/java/src/main/native/graph_jni.cc#L25
body_html:
In all these functions, it is probably prudent to handle the case where Server.close() has already been called (and thus handle is 0). I think currently this will crash.

You may want to do something like:

tensorflow/tensorflow/java/src/main/native/graph_jni.cc

Line 25 in 0f1894d

TF_Graph* requireHandle(JNIEnv* env, jlong handle) {
body_text:
In all these functions, it is probably prudent to handle the case where Server.close() has already been called (and thus handle is 0). I think currently this will crash.
You may want to do something like:
